https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/39ryJ415bQFiRaK8eKTjNel2K0o.jpg A look at one of the worst plane bombings of the 20th century. In 1985, an Air India 747 flying from Montreal, Canada to Delhi was blown up in mid-flight by Khalistani extremists. All 331 passengers were killed, most were of Indian origin. Air India 182
